descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
TOTALLY BASKETBALL lets you play the full sport of Basketball in VR!  Jump for the Tip-Off! Shoot free throws! Steal the ball but don't get a Foul! This game gives you the awesome ability to control your teammates while playing full court 3v3 matches. Play full matches or mini games singleplayer or with friends!
 
Newest Update:
 -6 person Multiplayer
 -Added Multiplayer Horse
 -Better shooting assist - Low, Med, High
 -More competitive AI players
 
Features:
 -Top notch realistic shooting physics!
 -Practice and tutorial modes for new players
 -Multiple teams/venues to play
 -Multiplayer
 -Customize your character
 -Monthly Game updates

 Join our large community on Discord to meet other players and tell us what you'd like to see in future updates!
